MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Name: Dave's Quick Search Taskbar Toolbar Deskbar
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Includes a directory of pluggable searchesx.

English.Keywords: search, taskbar, deskbar, toolbar, google, calculator, clock, translator, currency, dictionary, thesaurus, quotes, news, yahoo, quick, dave, dqsd, open source, gpl
English.Char_Desc_45: Dave's Quick Search Taskbar Toolbar Deskbar
English.Char_Desc_80: Dave's Quick Search Deskbar launches Google, Yahoo, and dozens of other searches
English.Char_Desc_250: Dave's Quick Search Deskbar launches Google, Yahoo, Switchboard, and dozens of other searches from your desktop taskbar. Its interface is clean but packs power: it also provides a calculator, clock, calendar, translator and currency converter.
English.Char_Desc_450: This is a clean, fast Internet search add-on for your desktop toolbar. The search bar does Google searches by default and lets you go directly to the top-ranked hit if you add an exclamation point at the end of your search terms. You can specify a Yahoo search by adding a question mark, a Merriam-Webster definition by adding a colon, a Bloomberg stock quotes by adding a dollar sign, and find Switchboard phone numbers by typing in a pound sign.
English.Char_Desc_2000: This is a clean, fast Internet search add-on for your desktop toolbar. The search bar does Google searches by default and lets you go directly to the top-ranked hit if you add an exclamation point at the end of your search terms. You can specify a Yahoo search by adding a question mark, a Merriam-Webster definition by adding a colon, a Bloomberg stock quotes by adding a dollar sign, and find Switchboard phone numbers by typing in a name followed by a pound sign. There's a built-in calculator, currency converter, translator, clock, and calendar.

Simtel.Simtel_WinXX_Category: Internet - webbrows Web Page / Browser Utilities
